title: Treasure at the Heart of the Tanglewood
description: An enchanting and atmospheric fantasy by the author of the Darkangel and Firebringer trilogies.First she is Brown Hannah, a drab healer living in the enchanted Tanglewood. Then, when she challenges the magician who holds her captive, she becomes Green Hannah. Next, she is Golden Hannah traveling through the land, with talking animals and birds by her side. And, finally, Russet Hannah, when she makes the long journey back to where she first grew, and learns her true story. "A well-fashioned fantasy with a particularly delightful ending."— School Library Journal
author: Meredith Ann Pierce
